name: Demon Slayer (claudio.visentin)
description:
A vertical slice of a game I made for college.

The game aims to recreate the looks and feel of a late 90's PlayStation game. The game is still in development: some of the collisions are dodgy and its missing some key features like the typical low rendering distance and fog.

RECOMMENDED: Run the game in 320x240 resolution.

Controls: WASD for movement, SPACE for jumping, Left Shift for running and Left Click to attack.
